interfaces

Interface Ihm

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    IhmForData

    public interface Ihm
    Interface for Data. Give the interface to update the IHM for change from network.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void notifyDownloadProgress(Music music, int integer)
      Update the IHM progress bar by giving the percentage of the download progression.
      void notifyMusicDeletion(Music music)
      Notify that a music has been deleted.
      void notifyUserConnection(User user)
      Notify IHM that a new User is connected.
      void notifyUserDeletion(User user)
      Notify that a User has been deleted.
      void notifyUserDisconnection(User user)
      Notify IHM that a User disconnected.
      void updateMusic(Music music)
      Trigger the update of all the occurrences of the modified music.
      void updateUser(User user)
      Trigger the update of all the occurrences of the modified user.

    • Method Detail

      • notifyUserConnection

        void notifyUserConnection(User user)
        Notify IHM that a new User is connected. This is just a change update, there is no user list exchange.
        Parameters:
        user - User recently connected.

      • notifyUserDisconnection

        void notifyUserDisconnection(User user)
        Notify IHM that a User disconnected. This is just a change update, there is no user list exchange.
        Parameters:
        user - User recently disconnected.

      • notifyDownloadProgress

        void notifyDownloadProgress(Music music,
                            int integer)
        Update the IHM progress bar by giving the percentage of the download progression.
        Parameters:
        music - Music considered.
        integer - Percentage progression, between 0 and 100.

      • updateMusic

        void updateMusic(Music music)
        Trigger the update of all the occurrences of the modified music.
        Parameters:
        music - Music to update.

      • notifyMusicDeletion

        void notifyMusicDeletion(Music music)
        Notify that a music has been deleted.
        Parameters:
        music - Deleted music.

      • updateUser

        void updateUser(User user)
        Trigger the update of all the occurrences of the modified user.
        Parameters:
        user - User to update

      • notifyUserDeletion

        void notifyUserDeletion(User user)
        Notify that a User has been deleted.
        Parameters:
        user - Deleted user.
